name: Infection (RhymH)
description:
Best played in full screen (Windows version avalable) This is INFECTED

A game in which you must defeat an evil infection that decimates the planet.

The less health you have the more powerfull you get !! Manage your health to beat the game quickly without dying ! Scores 

How much time do you need to get to the end ? leave a comment with your time !!

(expected 5-10 min to finish)

Game : Pierre Hebinger

Music : Nolesound  nolesound.itch.io

Controls ?

Move : WASD or Arrow keys

Jump/DoubleJump : Space

Shoot/Aim : Mouse

Quick restart : R

Rules ?

I did everything myself appart from the music and audio (link above)
